NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
April 8, 1952
To Messrs. Waldo Abbott
Graydon Ausmus
John Dunn
Alvin Gaines
William Harley
Richard Hull
Harold McCarty
James Miles
Allen Miller
Burton Paulu
Frank Schooley
Seymour Siegel
Dallas Smythe
Parker Wheatley
Gentlemen:
Attached you will find the minutes of the most recent meeting of
the Adult Education Committee of the NAEB and the relevant appendices on the
public discussion area of the project. You are urged to read this before the
meeting in Columbus.
This was prepared as a means of giving a complete report to you of
the work of the Adult Education Committee so that you will be in a better posi¬
tion to ask questions.
It is obviously impossible for me, as chairman of the Adult Education
Committee, to make a satisfactory report in the ten minutes assigned in the
agenda of the April 16 meeting at Columbus. I shall assume that those present
at the meeting will have read the attached report of the work of the Adult Edu¬
cation Committee. I propose to use the ten minutes to speak about the current
developments on the Adult Education Committee project and to raise certain
policy questions for consideration by the Board.
Sincerely yours.
George E.'Trobst, Chairman
Adult Education Committee
George E,
